text: Petrovka () is a rural locality (a selo) in Zilairsky Selsoviet, Zilairsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 147 as of 2010. There are 6 streets. == Geography == It is located 12 km from Zilair. == References == Category:Rural localities in Zilairsky District
title: Petrovka, Zilairsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
